description: this notice is for office_chair for goverment usd
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Title

*   **English Title:** WS412731519 (EP916-240079) Office Seating
*   **French Title:** WS412731519 (EP916-240079) Fauteuils de Bureau

## Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking bidders for a Request for Proposal (RFP) to supply Office Seating. This procurement is being conducted in accordance with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

## Important Details 

*   **Tender Number:** WS4127315192
*   **Tender Status:** Expired (Note: Tender Status is Expired and bidders are not allowed to submit. You may need to look for another tender opportunity)
*   **Publication Date:** August 11, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date:** Not applicable (Note: Tender Closing Date has passed)
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** September 1, 2023
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** N/A
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

## Contact Information

*   **Name:** Nancy Sell (SPAC/PSPC)
*   **Email:** nancy.sell@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
*   **Phone:** Not available

## Tender Description

The tender is for the procurement of Rotary chairs for delivery and installation in Ottawa, Ontario. The chairs will be delivered and installed between November 27, 2023 and December 15, 2023. There is a security requirement associated with this procurement.

## Link

The tender announcement can be found at [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17145249?extsite=MTcxNDUyNDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17145249?extsite=MTcxNDUyNDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==). The link is only valid during the applicable tender period.


Therefore, per the details, this tender is expired. You can check another tender on the link given above for your interest. It is worth noting that the contact information, will help if there are questions during the selection process. In case the
 procurement deadline is expired, consider checking the government's procurement website ([https://buyandsell.gc.ca](
